title: Fiora buffs LMAO

embed.description: 9.19 Patch Preview - Worlds Patch! Changes here are current and will be testing. Not yet final, feedback is welcome.

body:
riot are buffing fiora. Again.! This time she can hit towers plants and wards with her Q AND e can crit towers! Yes you heard that right!


Please dont do it. Why would you make fiora q hit towers???? (And wards)

replies.body:
in 3 patches: towers now have weakpoints fiora can hit to deal bonus% damage.

edit: people think im joking. im not. i HONESTLY believe this is something riot will consider. it just sounds funny but its not supposed to be.

In 6 patches: Fiora can now ult towers, if she hits all 4 vitals she will get the healing circle. If she kills the tower, she will also get the healing circle. 

In 10 patches: Fiora's riposte can now stun/disable towers after blocking a tower shot. 

In 15 patches: Fuck it, Fiora now oneshots towers and gets all plating gold.

Riot balance team in a nutshell

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-09-13T17:47:39.122+0000)
>
> in 3 patches: towers now have weakpoints fiora can hit to deal bonus% damage.
> 
> edit: people think im joking. im not. i HONESTLY believe this is something riot will consider. it just sounds funny but its not supposed to be.

''Fiora can now use her ultimate on enemy turrets, this will allow her to 1v1 towers, making Fiora players feel like they're really good at the game.''
yea. This is to help her splitpush. However she is way too good at other thinigs, so she shouldn't be good at splitpushing aswell...
Yes i know that. She dosent need that

Well, this is honestly the only Buff she needed, she was terible at splitting and taking towers, I am suprised Riot actually noticed that instantly wining lane frlm Champ Select on **doesn't** win games anymore?

Can we now revert the 29217 overbuffing her to auto win lane?
Knowing Riot, they wont revert the lane buffs.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-09-13T17:57:41.457+0000)
>
> Knowing Riot, they wont revert the lane buffs.

Probably.
And when her WR completly escalates: WhO cOuLd HaVe PrEdIcTeD tHaT? lEt Us GaThEr MoRe DaTA!!
Data >>> Playing the actual game apparently.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-13T19:12:53.402+0000)
>
> Data >>> Playing the actual game apparently.

Imagine pllaying Top and balancing Top.
Nah, fuck it, let us do random shit booiiiiis.

Even a Gold Toplaner could have told them that buffing Tryndamere and Jax is just stupid, especially touching them CD wise.
Again, Hashinshin speaks the truth: They do not have a toplaner on their team, or if they do, they are not that good.

Top laners don’t know what they want.

Well, actually, they just want to free win the lane and game, but that’s not realistic nor gonna happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Sewer Side,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=000200000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-09-14T14:17:05.548+0000)
>
> Top laners don’t know what they want.
> 
> Well, actually, they just want to free win the lane and game, but that’s not realistic nor gonna happen.

No?
Not seen one that demands that.
All we want is to be able to split and win 1v1s through being better at our champions, while still giving clear counterplay.
But you are obviously biased so I see no point to discuss with you. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Divin1ty,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0002000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-09-14T14:36:48.076+0000)
>
> No?
> Not seen one that demands that.
> All we want is to be able to split and win 1v1s through being better at our champions, while still giving clear counterplay.
> But you are obviously biased so I see no point to discuss with you. ^-^

Counterplay, nice joke.
Few champs in the game have counterplay (mainly the all skillshot champs, because you can dodge); fighters and ranged right clickers have the least counterplay, imo.
I miss season 4/5 where there were fewer broken designs and items ({{item:3161}} ).

> [{quoted}](name=MLDzXnRRR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=00020000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-09-14T16:53:36.121+0000)
>
> Counterplay, nice joke.
> Few champs in the game have counterplay (mainly the all skillshot champs, because you can dodge); fighters and ranged right clickers have the least counterplay, imo.
> I miss season 4/5 where there were fewer broken designs and items ({{item:3161}} ).

First you complain about fighters, than you want 4/5 back.
Release GP, Juggernaut Update that broken an entire Class and made Darius dunk at Worlds and a lot, lot more.

You just want to complain to complain, don't you?

> [{quoted}](name=Divin1ty,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=000200000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-14T17:08:59.694+0000)
>
> First you complain about fighters, than you want 4/5 back.
> Release GP, Juggernaut Update that broken an entire Class and made Darius dunk at Worlds and a lot, lot more.
> 
> You just want to complain to complain, don't you?

You are joking by mentioning the part of the season when the game went straight downhill, right?
The game was "perfectly" balanced before that for some months- even todays faceroll champs like yasuo and zed were considered taking a skill at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=MLDzXnRRR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0002000000000000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-14T17:26:00.764+0000)
>
> You are joking by mentioning the part of the season when the game went straight downhill, right?
> The game was "perfectly" balanced before that for some months- even todays faceroll champs like yasuo and zed were considered taking a skill at this point.

No it wasn't. Season 5 is put up on a pedestal it never deserved. Cinderhulk meta invalidated early game champs and fighters, Devourer meta fucked over solo queue, and juggy meta forced everyone to priority ban every juggy in the jugs patch. Season 5 was NOT as good as people keep going on about.

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=00020000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-14T18:54:00.462+0000)
>
> No it wasn't. Season 5 is put up on a pedestal it never deserved. Cinderhulk meta invalidated early game champs and fighters, Devourer meta fucked over solo queue, and juggy meta forced everyone to priority ban every juggy in the jugs patch. Season 5 was NOT as good as people keep going on about.

Nah, cinderhulk meta was fine, anyone was viable, assassins actually took skill.
Devourer was never meta in decent elos, it was instalose for the farming jungler - Koreans even tried to play Yi jungle like twice in competitive and barely won (1?) game by some miracle plays after being thousands of gold behind.

> [{quoted}](name=MLDzXnRRR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=000200000000000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-15T08:51:45.397+0000)
>
> Nah, cinderhulk meta was fine, anyone was viable, assassins actually took skill.

So we just blatantly lie and pretend that we didn't just stack tanks back in that meta?

> [{quoted}](name=Divin1ty,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-09-13T17:49:54.398+0000)
>
> Well, this is honestly the only Buff she needed, she was terible at splitting and taking towers, I am suprised Riot actually noticed that instantly wining lane frlm Champ Select on **doesn't** win games anymore?
> 
> Can we now revert the 29217 overbuffing her to auto win lane?

So does Shen. He cant split push well either unless he goes demolish and a strict item path. He is a good teamfighter but lacks in the split which makes sense. Its a way to macro balance. I have no idea why they are making Fiora this strong in all areas of macro gameplay.
I would be fine with these Fiora buffs, I just think that she doesn't need the massive attack speed slow from W?
Or, better yet, lets just remove the true damage from her passive and make it so that she has to R to get the true damage vitals.
100% remove the true damage BS

Nope.
That's her mechanic. And it was after the rework so that she can bust down tanks and juggernauts while not being one. She needs this or she needs another rework, in a form of putting that rapier up your ass and going hilt deep on the damage.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-09-13T19:13:43.768+0000)
>
> Or, better yet, lets just remove the true damage from her passive and make it so that she has to R to get the true damage vitals.

Or just remove fucking %HP true Damage since it lacks every counterplay.

Right now her passive does 3 things (cant think of another champ that gets 3 different things from their passive):
% Max True Damage
Movespeed
Healing

Reminder that most champs will either have one or two things on their passive. If she's gonna have true damage on her passive, then remove the heal and movespeed.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0007000000010000,timestamp=2019-09-13T19:29:20.028+0000)
>
> Right now her passive does 3 things (cant think of another champ that gets 3 different things from their passive):
> % Max True Damage
> Movespeed
> Healing
> 
> Reminder that most champs will either have one or two things on their passive. If she's gonna have true damage on her passive, then remove the heal and movespeed.

Tbh, GP has MS and true Damage too.
Really depends on the Champ you give it too. ^^
GP has it because he has no mobility spell. Fiora does.

Eh, no.
She needs heal as in order to proc this, she needs to be in melee range. Both heal and MS on proc is because Fiora isn't like Jax, where she goes in and bashes your head in. She's way less tankier than him and not in Riven's League either and she relies on hit and run tactic. Proc Vitals for the damage and harass.

Of you want this removed, then her W CD goes down significantly or gets the ammo system, where she can now block more attacks, abilities, damage or CC and be overall more resistant to all-ins.

Her Vitals don't even spawn on the same side (close to her) so that she gets free harass every time you're in range. Fiora's not a good top laner currently and these buffs help her to compete with other laners.

This is actually a good change believe it or not. This is a real Fiora fix.

Before they just kept buffing Fiora without actually fixing her core problems that were keeping her from winning games. She sucks at both splitting and teamfighting.

This is actually what top laners have been saying for a very long time. Fiora just sucks at winning *the game*.

This allows her to actually be a splitpush threat to structures rather than just champions.

#However

With this buff which massively enhances her ability to win games, she needs a _massive fucking nerf_ to her overall dueling power which is currently through the goddam roof. It's actually hard to lose lane as Fiora right now due to all the dumb buffs they kept tacking onto her.

TL;DR: Good change, but nerf her damage now.
I didnt say its not good. I just dont think she needs it after all of the buffs she got.

She needs it, but she also *needs* nerfs.

This change is a huge gameplay fix for her kit that she really, really needs and has needed for a long time. Hopefully they do the right thing and both nerf her and put this fix on her.

So {{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:240}} can all hit towers with their empowered auto or spell but you guys get mad when Fiora can now?

> [{quoted}](name=only luciano,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-09-14T00:47:01.478+0000)
>
> So {{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:240}} can all hit towers with their empowered auto or spell but you guys get mad when Fiora can now?

They don't dash with it buddy and they can't use it to dash out of fights
Jax empowered auto doesn't work against towers.
it resets your auto attack and helps you stack passive faster, so it technically helps on towers

I know that she was getting buffs, I didn't read them tho and WHAT THE FUCK? Her q is a dash attack, WHY THE FUCK ARE THEY GOING TO MAKE IT TARGET TURRETS? Why can her E now crit turrets? Are you not aware that her split push is ALREADY FUCKING GODLIKE? She's the Grand Duelist, if you try to counter her split with 1 person you die. Try again with 2, you die. Please for the love of god riot what the actual fuck are you doing?

Community: Champions should have clear strengths and weaknesses
Riot: What if we made 20-30 champions good at everything?

Can we make her q aimable pls? It's so annoying how a fiora will use a towards u even in a wrong direction but it will hit the vital anyway, a good fiora will hit it a bad one won't so why do they make it easy for everyone? Fiora gives me ptsd annoying poke, dash every 2 seconds, insane heal, cc block that destroys your attack speed true fcking dmg and stacking up armor doesn't do shit.
The world's patch is looking mighty questionable right about now.

To be honest she needed this , she really needed this , for a split pusher she is the weakest between them
Imo they should have did this buff a while ago , but yeah , if they were gonna do this buff then the previous buffs shouldn't have been done
Also why would this Buff not break Fiora?  Because Fiora will run out of mana faster now if she is going to use her Q on towers.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahri Baka,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-09-13T18:16:10.657+0000)
>
> To be honest she needed this , she really needed this , for a split pusher she is the weakest between them
> Imo they should have did this buff a while ago , but yeah , if they were gonna do this buff then the previous buffs shouldn't have been done
> Also why would this Buff not break Fiora?  Because Fiora will run out of mana faster now if she is going to use her Q on towers.

Ah yes, forgot that her counterplay is RNG and running OOM.
Boi do I want to play Top again when I leave therapy. xd

> [{quoted}](name=Divin1ty,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UEOy7P80,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-09-13T18:30:30.382+0000)
>
> Ah yes, forgot that her counterplay is RNG and running OOM.
> Boi do I want to play Top again when I leave therapy. xd

Your reply doesn't make sense tbh
This buff has nothing to do with Fiora as a fighter , it's for her split pushing Power

oh they're finally giving her a real buff after she's received all the other pointless number buffs.
now she will run the rift.
the fact you dont know how to play her dosent make her bad

You don't look like a guy who plays her.
Fiora's essentially not a top laner at the moment, Jax runs the show. So Riot buffing her in order to be able to fight him is a bad thing? But literally before, people were complaining about Jax being strong?

I'm not sure what's more stupid, complaining for the sake of complaining or people actually expecting that Riot just nerfs things down until nothing can be reliably played due to how inherently weak they've become compared to everyone else?

I dont know whats more stupid. People thinking there can be only 1 broken champ or people not knowing fiora is good in to jax.

Fiora does not need these. She is really stong as she is.

Why di i need to be a fiora player to say that?  I do play fiora here and there.  But its like saying someone cant say he had a terrible flight because he is not the pilot. Thats stupid.

Jax can time his stun, he doesn't have to wait for a full duration.
The matchup with Fiora goes both ways. Jax is trying to force her W, Fiora's trying to predict his stun and the follow up in order to counter and do some damage with Vitals.

Fiora doesn't auto-win against him, they're evenly matched in this particular thing.
If Fiora mistimes his stun, she's eating the Q, W and R. Meanwhile Fiora has to dick around with Vitals (her P, not R) that may or may not face her for poke damage. Meanwhile if she ults, she still has to face Jax's E and play the same game as before but now time gated or else her R will disappear.

Jax has frontloaded damage, Fiora doesn't.
Her Vitals do most of the work in her kit, Jax relies on brute force that's easier to control and comes from on-hit.

>Why di i need to be a fiora player to say that?

Because a Fiora player would actually know where she stands, how her kit functions, how she's doing her damage and her bad splitpushing capability. Playing a few games on her, does not give you the full picture to a point that you need to speak out against her splitpushing buffs that absolutely do nothing in PvP on top lane.

As a Fiora smurf main, they need to revert the atk speed buff or the parry buff if they’re adding this. She won’t be broken after this but she is dangerously approaching Jax/riven tier if riot keeps power creeping her like this.
